channel.title: Publishers on Coull Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Publishers on Coull Documentation

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: The Coull Delivery Platform enables you to deliver a selection of effective and unique ad formats across the highest quality video inventory. Coull delivers ads via the IAB’s VAST/VPAID schema, which provides support for a number of different formats over video, including: Linear pre-roll, mid-roll and post-roll MP4 or FLV video ads Non-linear GIF/JPG/PNG, Flash (SWF), text, HTML, <iframe> and <script> overlay banners Interactive Flash and HTML5 VPAID ads

item.title: Ads.txt
item.description: For more detail, see Coull ad formats and creative specs You can purchase high-quality inventory in the Coull Ad Exchange in the following ways: Real-time bidding in the open auction. Reach your target audience through real-time bidding. Private marketplace deals. Buy premium inventory through preferred deals and private auctions. If you can’t access specific features or perform the tasks described in these pages, please contact support@coull.com.
